pr_title: CB-6729 Sdx create should not wait for stopped environment

timeline.bodyText: I think it would make sense to prepare the code for environment currently stopping. As I see env service will wait until datahubs etc. are stopped so it may take a considerable amount if time until it is stopped.
timeline.author: gergopapi2

replies.bodyText: And maybe env starting should also be filtered out, as the env might only partially be functional.
replies.author: gergopapi2

replies.bodyText:
Also it might be a good idea to collect all the env statuses to a list where the poller
should immediately exit + we should not allow creation. I'm guessing the 2 list should be identical.
replies.author: lnardai
